fileimporter-desc: Easy importing of files from other sites
fileimporter-api-badinfo: Bad image or revision info returned by the API.
fileimporter-api-failedtogetinfo: Failed to retrieve file information from: $1
fileimporter-api-nopagesreturned: No pages returned by the remote API.
fileimporter-api-toomanyrevisions: Too many revisions returned by the API, can't import.
fileimporter-cantimportfromsharedrepo: Can't import a file from a shared repository.
fileimporter-cantimportfilehidden: Can't import file because at least one of its revisions contains a suppressed file.
fileimporter-badimporthash: Import hash does not match. Please restart the import.
fileimporter-filenameerror-default: There is an unknown issue with your filename.
fileimporter-filenameerror-illegal: The file name you are currently trying to import to is invalid.
fileimporter-filenameerror-toolong: The file name you are currently trying to import to is too long.
fileimporter-filenameerror-automaticchan: The file name was automatically changed from "$1" to "$2"
fileimporter-filenameerror-nosourceexten: The source file name does not have an extension.
fileimporter-filenameerror-noplannedexte: The planned file name does not have an extension.
fileimporter-filenameerror-missmatchexte: Target file extension does not match the extension of the original file.
fileimporter-localtitleexists: The title you are currently trying to import to already exists on this wiki.
fileimporter-sourcetitleexists: The title you are currently trying to import to already exists on the source wiki.
fileimporter-illegalfilenamechars: The title you are currently trying to import to contains invalid filename characters.
fileimporter-duplicatefilesdetected: The file you are currently trying to import already exists on this wiki.
fileimporter-textrevisions: $1/$2 page {{PLURAL:$2|revision|revisions}} will be imported from the revision history.
fileimporter-previewnote: This is a preview of the file to be imported. Please check the page in detail before importing.
fileimporter-in-beta: File import is in beta mode: We tested it carefully but it still might have some problems. If you encounter problems, please [//www.mediawiki.org/w/index.php?title=Extension_talk:FileImporter report them on our help page] - ideally with a step by step way to reproduce the problem, so we can understand and fix it.
fileimporter-filemissinginrevision: Can't import file because at least one of its revisions is missing an image file.
fileimporter-filetoolarge: The {{PLURAL:$1|file|$1 file versions}} you are currently trying to import {{PLURAL:$1|exceeds|exceed}} the file size limit the import can handle.
fileimporter-import-wait: The import may take a few minutes.
fileimporter-imported-success-banner: This file has been successfully imported to {{SITENAME}}. Click the following link to view the file: $1
fileimporter-imported-change-template:
We kindly ask that you return to the original file and do the following:
# Remove any template suggesting that this file should be copied to {{SITENAME}}.
# Add a template declaring that this file is now available on {{SITENAME}}.
Thank you very much!
fileimporter-commonshelper-retrieval-fai: An error occurred while checking for blocked files.
fileimporter-commonshelper-parsing-faile: The configuration file for your wiki ($1) does not contain enough info about <$2> to know if this file can be put on Commons.
fileimporter-file-contains-blocked-categ: The file cannot be imported, because it is marked as $1. $2 does not allow such files.
fileimporter-file-missing-required-templ: The file cannot be imported, because it is not marked with one of the required licences.
fileimporter-input-page-info-text: Learn more by visiting our [//meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/WMDE_Technical_Wishes/Move_files_to_Commons help page].
